meanings.definition: To eject the contents of the stomach through the mouth.
meanings.sent1: After eating too much candy, she vomited in the bathroom.
meanings.sent2: The sick child vomited after spinning around too fast.
meanings.sent3: The clown vomited confetti during the magic show, surprising everyone.
meanings.sent4: The volcano vomited lava, causing destruction in the village below.
meanings.sent5: The horror movie scene made her feel like she could almost smell the vomited blood.

meanings.sent1: The pressure built up in the pipe until it vomited water everywhere.
meanings.sent2: The angry protester vomited insults at the politician.
meanings.sent3: The broken dam vomited a rush of water downstream, flooding the valley.
meanings.sent4: The storm clouds vomited rain, drenching the city streets.
meanings.sent5: The overloaded garbage can vomited trash onto the sidewalk.
